data.title: Raw Material Supplier from Gurgaon, Haryana Oracle India Pvt. Ltd., is a subsidiary of Oracle Corporation, US, and markets the complete range of Oracle technology and applications products and service
data.text:
About EIRI Board

EIRI Board is a single destination for all the industry, company and country reports. We feature large repository of latest industry reports, leading and niche company profiles, and market statistics prepared by highly qualified consultants and verified by a panel of experts.

Industrial Project Reports/Project Profiles

EIRI provides project reports that inclues Present Market Position and Expected Future Demand, Market Size, Statistics, Trends, SWOT Analysis and Forecasts. Report provides a comprehensive analysis from industry covering detailed reporting and evaluates the position of the industry by providing insights to the SWOT analysis of the industry.

Click Here to see list of project reports.

Technology Books

EIRI have published over 225 Process Technology Books covering Process Technology, Formulations, Project Profiles on varied subjects including Paint, Plastic, Food Processing, Rubber, Soaps & Detergents, Disinfectants, Cleaners, Phenyl, Agarbatti, Small Scale Industries, Biotechnology, Solar, Textiles, Textile Auxiliaries, Beverages, Waste, Frozen Food, Ceramics, Mushroom, Dairy & Poultry, Oilseeds, Wood, Flour Mill, Bakery & Confectionery, Biogas and many more which are quite useful for new and established entrepreneurs.

Market Survey

Market Survey Reports throws light on the Present Market Potential as well as future scope of the industry. EIRI can prepare Market Survey Reports on various fields such as Chemicals, Mechanical, Metallurgical, Electrical and Electronics, Rubber and Plastics, Food and Textile Products, Plantations, Soaps & Detergents, Disposable, Medical and Pharmaceuticals etc. having development prospects and future scenario.

Formulae

We provide small scale manufacturing technology through various modules like Printed Formulations Books, Formulation eBooks, Product Formulations. Our formulations are easy to understand in easy English with clear names of raw materials, rather than hidden trade names of specific raw material manufacturing with hidden chemistry. Oursï¿½ formulations are mostly quite useful for almost all the beginners and established industrialists.
